databases.normal_db:
databaseName: normal_db
dataSources:
  ds_0:
    password: 
    url: jdbc:opengauss://127.0.0.1:5432/demo_ds_0
    username: root
    minPoolSize: 1
    maxPoolSize: 50
  ds_1:
    password: 
    url: jdbc:opengauss://127.0.0.1:5432/demo_ds_1
    username: root
    minPoolSize: 1
    maxPoolSize: 50

meta_data.rules:
rules:
- !AUTHORITY
  privilege:
    type: ALL_PERMITTED
  users:
  - authenticationMethodName: ''
    password: root
    user: root@%
- !GLOBAL_CLOCK
  enabled: false
  provider: local
  type: TSO
